name: Why Even Bother?
description:
This is a simple bitsy thing I put together.
It's basically a semi autobiographical venting game.
It may not make sense, and it's not meant to be happy or fun.
But hopefully someone can get something good out of it.

Controls - Arrow keys to move/advance text, walk into things to interact with them.

Art and music is by me, Amber Rose.
Made in bitsy https://ledoux.itch.io/bitsy
Music made with PXTone https://studiopixel.jp/pxtone/
